description:
With this DLC you'll unlock:

- UD-1 Whirligig Drone and Shark Drone with high damage per second!
- 30 gold bars to spend on unique weapons or boosters
- 7500 cash to spend on weapon and troops upgrades

Prepare for the next battle much faster thanks to extra currency and give your opponents a taste of your drones!
name: Infantry Attack: Drone Squad
